If the score is greater than your Rank, you are drowned - .
If the score is less than or equal to your Rank, you are swept mysteriously to a beach of white sand fringed with feathery palms. Lose 2-12 Stamina points and (if you can survive that)
turn to 559 in The Serpent King’s Domain.
[Lacking this book, you are swept elsewhere; .]
